name: manhunter
ability: whenever the scout performs an action (including one in combat) she can immediately move

name: bulwark
ability: gain one dice from any attack which does not deal damage (is fully absorbed by armour)

name: sorcerer
ability: at the end of the expedition redraw all spell cards

name: berserker
ability: sacrifice one dice to gain one damage

name: cleric
ability: sacrifice one dice to heal two dice of another character

name: haruspex
ability: spend one dice to cast any spell
